name: KongaliCoin
description: KongaliCoin (KAC) is an ERC20 token deployed by KongAli1720.
extendedDescription: KongaliCoin (KAC) was created as part of a learning journey and community project focused on blockchain technology, tokenization, and decentralized finance. The goal of KAC is to provide a transparent and educational example of how ERC20 tokens are developed, deployed, and managed. While KAC is not intended as an investment vehicle, it represents the vision of KongAli1720 to explore crypto innovation and promote blockchain adoption.
